text: Robert Eggers (born July 7, 1983) is an American movie director and screenwriter. He created three horror movies called The Witch (2015), The Lighthouse (2019), and Nosferatu (2024). He also directed a historical epic movie The Northman (2022). He was born in New York City. ==Movies== Year Title Director Writer Producer 2015 The Witch 2019 The Lighthouse 2022 The Northman 2024 Nosferatu ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Movie directors from New York City Category:Screenwriters from New York City Category:Living people Category:Movie producers from New York City
title: Robert Eggers
